summary.span: 定義控制項要實作的介面，以取得或設定其文字內容。

span.span: Defines the interface a control implements to get or set its text content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會定義控制項實作以允許使用者入門的屬性或其文字內容的設定。The interface defines the property a control implements to allow the getting or setting of its text content. 可以設定屬性，以程式設計方式或透過使用者輸入。The property can be set programmatically or through user input. > [!CAUTION] > 實作這個介面的控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入。A control implementing this interface can be used to display user input. 顯示使用者輸入之前, 惡意用戶端指令碼，例如可執行的指令碼或 SQL 陳述式的輸入都必須檢查。Before displaying user input, the input must be checked for malicious client script, such as executable script or SQL statements. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示自訂控制項實作介面。The following code example shows a custom control that implements the interface. 預設值指派給屬性如果`null`傳遞至屬性。A default value is assigned to the property if `null` is passed to the property.
